Basic linear algebra
********************

This chapter describes Elemental's support for basic linear algebra routines, 
such as matrix-matrix multiplication, triangular solves, and matrix-vector
multiplication. Most of these routines have counterparts in the Basic Linear
Algebra Subprograms (BLAS).

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   blas-like/level1
   blas-like/level2
   blas-like/level3
   blas-like/tuning
